fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.adaptative

Class GaussianProductKernel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.Kernel<T>
      • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.adaptative.GaussianProductKernel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GaussianProductKernel<T>
extends Kernel<T>
    Major kernel computed as a weighted product of minor Gaussian kernels : K = k_i^{w_i}
    Computation of the kernel matrix is done by running a thread on sub matrices. The number of threads is chosen as function of the number of available cpus.
    Author:
    dpicard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
